stories.text:
I've noticed that my results searched through the omnibar in firefox to `html.duckduckgo.com` have been really bad and my !g usage has skyrocketed.

For example, searching `golang net/http` does not return `pkg.go.dev/net/http`.

I tried to reproduce in an incognito tab and everything works fine there! I've narrowed down the issue in the request headers to an additional `df=w` parameter in both the raw post data & the sent cookie, removing it returns much better results.

    curl 'https://html.duckduckgo.com/html/' \
    -H 'Accept: text/html;q=0.9' \
    -H 'Accept-Language: en-US,en;q=0.5' \
    -H 'Cookie: kl=us-en; df=w' \
    --data-raw 'q=golang+net%2Fhttp&b=&kl=us-en&df=w'
What gives?
